p: Measurement of antioxidants (AA) and total polyphenols (TPC) was done with an extract prepared as previously described by Tuberoso et al. [ 39] with some modifications. Briefly, 3 g of olive oil was mixed with 5 mL of methanol/water (80/20, v/ v). The mixture was shaken for 2 min, and the hydrophilic phase was filtered with a GD/X 0.45 µm cellulose acetate septa (25 mm, Sartorius, Madrid, Spain). This procedure was repeated twice with the lipophilic phases, and all the hydrophilic extracts were evaporated in a rotary evaporator at 35 °C. Finally, the residue was dissolved in 1.5 mL of methanol.
